channel.title: Comments on: This is Stupid and very Sprite

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description: I like how Snoop Dogg is wearing a Steelers cap. Nothing like a BAND WAGON. But then, I guess that would appeal to the sports gamers that worship at the throne of Madden.
item.content:encoded: I like how Snoop Dogg is wearing a Steelers cap. Nothing like a BAND WAGON. But then, I guess that would appeal to the sports gamers that worship at the throne of Madden.

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: I'd sell out for some bawls. So Foton, are you trying out for the hip-hop gaming league?
item.content:encoded: I’d sell out for some bawls. So Foton, are you trying out for the hip-hop gaming league?

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description:
<blockquote>Promising to "change the face of sports and video gaming forever," entertainer Snoop Dogg today announced the formation of the Hip-Hop Gaming League, a new sports organization melding two of his favorite interests.</blockquote>
That's funny.... I thought Hip-Hop and <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marijuana" rel="nofollow">MaryJane</a> were his two favorite interests.
item.content:encoded:
Promising to “change the face of sports and video gaming forever,” entertainer Snoop Dogg today announced the formation of the Hip-Hop Gaming League, a new sports organization melding two of his favorite interests.

That’s funny…. I thought Hip-Hop and MaryJane were his two favorite interests.
